reviews.review: Avengers: Infinity War is the best movie of Marvel Studios, this movie has many interesting action scenes and the best finale that I was seen in a superhero movie

I few things i didnt like is that they made hulk look like a bitch and hid the whole fuckin movie then loki who never gets recognition in any of the marvel fimes for being one of the most powerful gods in norce mythology and we may never get to see that after this one either.
Just incredible, definitely a must see!
The first truly good and unpredictable Avengers movie. Never said this before after a Marvel movie but... can't wait for the next one!
Amazing movie don't agree with the critics, just an amazing movie

When a movie makes me, exclusively, through grief, shock and joy, that movie is doing something very right. During the 2:30+ hours of Infinity War, I found myself alternating from sitting on the edge of my theatre seat, giggling, smiling from ear to ear, having my hands on my mouth in shock and awe to crying uncontrollably like a child. Perhaps having watched the whole MCU in order for the past month has made the experience more intense and the stakes higher, but that is undoubtedly the genius that is Marvel. The movie ended at 3pm and we talked about it until it was time to go to bed. We will probably go see it again this week.

The tone is set from the start, and each scene offers meaningful action until its bold climax. This is the best action movie I've ever seen to date, and this is exactly what the superhero genre was meant to be.

I'm actually excited for the next installment of the Avengers franchise! After 'Black Panther', I felt like Marvel was growing stale. However, Avengers: Infinity War just injected the fun back into the franchise. I felt like this film was serious, funny, and dramatic in all the right places. I'm taking off a star for the hilariously bad performance by Peter Dinklage.
One of the best summer blockbusters that I've ever seen. They did an excellent job!
3 hours later.. glad it finally ended.. went on and on and on.. How many times can you blow something up.
